issue.title: [Integration][Java] null type integration test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7899](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7899). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.* ### Original Issue Description: From   ### **[lidavidm](https://github.com/lidavidm)** commented [2 days ago](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6368#issuecomment-587593218) |
 
If I'm not mistaken, this means that we only compare the data fully if there's actual data in both JSON and in the Arrow file?
Though the Flight test is also potentially wrong:
 

It only compares the last batch sent over the wire.| |-|

comments.body:
